bidOnAuction(uint256,uint256).details: options for the bidder to bid on token ERC721

returns._0: success whether the function succeded or not

claimAuction(address,address,uint256).details: after 2 days of auction, the highest bidder can claim the token, The contract verifies that the token is off the auctions and that the address claiming the token is the one that won the auction.

returns.success: whether the function succeded or not

returns._0: success whether the function succeded or not
